Developer Terms of Use
des:
We only have the smart home in mind: enjoy all your home's technology with Freedompro.

First, search for Freedompro among the skills and click "Activate" in your Alexa app to connect your Freedompro account. To create it, use your Google or Facebook credentials.

Thanks to Freedompro and Alexa, you can now manage your lights, window-coverings, thermostats and much more with your smartphone or voice.

The Freedompro skill is compatible with Freedompro devices:
- Easykon for KNX
- Easykon for MyHome

The types of accessories compatible are:
- Lights
- Temperature sensors
- Thermostats
- Switches
- Outlets
- Window coverings
- Fans
- Locks
- Doors
- Garage doors
- Scenes

Controlling lights:
- You can switch individual lights on/off, for example: "Alexa, turn on the desk lamp", or create groups to control multiple devices together: "Alexa, turn off the kitchen lights" or "Alexa, turn off the sleeping area lights".
- You can manage the brightness and colour of each light source compatible with these functions, for example: "Alexa, set the brightness of the living room light to 50" or "Alexa, set the LED strip to blue".

Controlling window coverings:
- You can manage individual window covering, for example: "Alexa, open the bedroom window covering"; or create groups to control multiple devices together: "Alexa, close the first floor window coverings all the way".
 - You can control how far the window coverings open, for example: "Alexa, open the kitchen window covering up to 40" or "Alexa, open all the window coverings up to 70."


Controlling thermostats:
- You can manage individual thermostats, for example: "Alexa, set the living room temperature to 21°"; or create groups to control multiple devices together: "Alexa, lower the room temperature".
